title: Blitz is Without Mercy - Could Yuriy Have Stopped This Attack? | WBC | Round 3
description:
#agadmator subscribers.videos.agadmator@gmail.com
Send me your photos and videos to this email :)

Watch live coverage here https://en.chessbase.com/post/world-rapid-championship-riyadh-2017

The "King Salman World Blitz & Rapid Championships 2017" in Riyadh from December 26th to 30th. The first five rounds of the rapid tournament take place on December 26th. A record $2 million prize fund has attracted most of the world's best players.

Magnus Carlsen vs Yuriy Kryvoruchko
World Blitz Championship (2017), Riyadh KSA, rd 3, Dec-29
Indian Game (A45)

1. d4 Nf6 2. Bf4 e6 3. e3 d5 4. Nf3 c5 5. c3 Nc6 6. Nbd2 Be7 7. Bd3 Nh5 8. Be5 f6 9. Bg3 g6 10. Qe2 Bd7 11. dxc5 Bxc5 12. e4 Nxg3 13. hxg3 dxe4 14. Bxe4 Kf7 15. O-O-O Qc7 16. Nc4 Rad8 17. Qd2 Bc8 18. Qh6 Rxd1+ 19. Rxd1 Kg8 20. g4 Bxf2 21. Bxc6 bxc6 22. g5 Qf4+ 23. Kb1 Qxc4 24. gxf6
